name: Super Evolution
description:
---Game Background---  
There is a devil trying to destroy this world! Summoner, form a powerful team to fight against it!  

---Game Features--- 
This game is made by many animation fanatics. The exquisite graphics, cute characters, brand new designed Capturing System, and Instance Exploring System will bring you a wonderful gaming experience! Are you ready? Start your surprising adventures with over 200 lovely monsters!  

---Featured Systems---  
1. Famous Japanese voice actors joined 
Japanese voice actors perform their voice and act those monsters in this game which make them more vivid.
2. 3 levels of monster evolution  
The lovely monsters become powerful warriors. More than 200 monsters to capture. Build up a greatest adventurous team for your own.   
3. Pioneer instance exploring system 
Get rid of the traditional instance mode! Dungeons and more than 100 active events surprise you every minute. Pass them to earn great treasures.  
4. Magic skills ready to cast 
Evolve your monsters to learn more powerful magic skills. Hold your fire and cast it on the right time to make biggest damage to Devils. Show us a epic battle!  
5. Boss monster capture system 
Wanna have your owned Boss monster? Boss monsters show randomly in the game. They are so beautiful and deadly. Just jump into the combat and capture one!
